str2: Joseph, a proper name. Of Hebrew origin; Joseph, the name of seven Israelites.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
From dike; equitable; by implication, innocent, holy.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Singular
str2: To will, wish, desire, be willing, intend, design.
To hold up as an example, make a show of, expose. From deigma; to exhibit.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To will, intend, desire, wish. Middle voice of a primary verb; to 'will, ' i.e. be willing.
From apo and luo; to free fully, i.e. relieve, release, dismiss, or let die, pardon or divorce.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Accusative Feminine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
Secretly, privately. Adverb from lanthano; privately.
